name: Chicken Demon
description:
Chicken Demon is a rouge-like top-down-shooter. Will you be able to kill the demons or will they blast you into chicken wings? Will you run out of ammo? How long will your weapons last? 

Chicken Demon is still in early development. Many features like random levels, Storymode and Highscoremode are still missing. 

Chicken Demon was made for the gppcc17 by Let'sGameDev
